Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to repealing paragraph 9 of subdivision a of section 26-405 of the administrative code of the city of New York relating to public hearings by the city rent agency; repealer
Summary: Relates to public hearings by the city rent agency.
LawCode: Rpld §26-405 sub a ¶9, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal paragraph 9 of subdivision a of section 26-405 of the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to public hearings by the city rent agency
